archimate:Requirement.name: BA.1.3.3d: d) unauthorised or incorrect changes to information are detected (e.g. by inspecting change logs, using automated checksum tools or reconciling data back to its original source).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
